item.title: Create a Run Configuration
item.description:
Select Run > Run Configurations....
Double-click Composite Application. A new run configuration named New_configuration is created and opened in the configuration editor.
In the Name field, type helloworld_configuration.
In the Test Server field, click Browse.... A pop-up displays asking you to create a test server. Click Yes.
In the Name field, type a name for the server. In the Runtime drop-down list, select TIBCO Host Server and click Next >.
Click Test Connection. Click OK to dismiss the Connection Info pop-up. Click Finish.
In the Composite Applications area, click Add.... Click upgrade.helloworld.soa and click OK.
Click the Application Templates tab. Uncheck the checkboxes next to com.tibco.amx.governance.agent.daa and com.tibco.amx.mediation.daa.
Click the Advanced tab and expand the HTTP Connectors node. Click the Value column, type 9095, and press Enter.
Click Apply and Close. The run configuration changes are saved.
